Data security 
The Autodesk security framework was designed 
around industry standards to ensure consistent 
security practices, enabling us to build secure, run 
secure, and stay secure.
Autodesk implements security policies based on 
industry best practices. We regularly conduct internal 
and external audits, attestations, and third‑party 
security assessments to monitor for changes in 
the environment, test our policies and procedures, 
and identify new and emerging risks. We meet 
our obligations under the General Data Protection 
Regulation and the California Consumer Privacy Act.
